professionalIntro: I'm a full-stack software engineer. I focus mainly on backend systems, but I also enjoy UI work here and there. My overarching career aim is to build things that tangibly benefit real people.
personalIntro: Outside of work I love to get outdoors, play the piano, and read. My #1 hobby is a tie between slogging up large mountains and fly fishing.
contactBody: Feel free to connect on Linkedin, or email me!
contactBody2: Or, check me out in other corners of the web:
